quote: I whispered across the bars to Jackaby as I rose, ""Shall I tell them the truth?""""Have you killed anyone?"" he asked, quietly.""No, of course not!""""Then I can't imagine why you shouldn't.
quote_letters: I WHISPERED ACROSS THE BARS TO JACKABY AS I ROSE SHALL I TELL THEM THE TRUTHHAVE YOU KILLED ANYONE HE ASKED QUIETLYNO OF COURSE NOTTHEN I CANT IMAGINE WHY YOU SHOULDNT
